Detailed Description

Client application class Establishes a connection, reads strings from socket and allows message sending.

Read string from socket.

Returns:
read string.
void TTRClientThread::run ( void   ) [virtual]

Thread run method. Started when start() is called. Connects to server and reads strings from socket. If disconnected calls onDisconnect(); otherwise calls commandHandler(read string).

Implements Thread.
